entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Buchans

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
